      abstract long AbstractNode.changeTime() 
      N AbstractNode.copyTo(Path target)
      Copies the information of this node to a new one.
      If isGroup also copies all sub nodes.
      The target can not be a sub path.
      abstract boolean AbstractNode.create()
      Stores node to the file system.
      abstract long AbstractNode.createTime() 
      abstract boolean AbstractNode.exists()
      Asserts this node is stored.
      abstract N[] AbstractNode.list()
      Retrieves all existing sub nodes.
      abstract byte[] AbstractNode.md5() 
      N AbstractNode.moveTo(Path target)
      Moves the information of this node to a new one.
      If isGroup also moves all sub nodes.
      The destiny can not be a sub path.
      This node is removed from the file system if destination node is not equals to this one.
      java.io.InputStream AbstractNode.read()
      Gives an input stream with the last stored information of the node.

      Gives an input stream with the last stored information of the node.
      abstract boolean AbstractNode.remove()
      Removes node from the file system.
      If isGroup also removes all sub nodes.
      abstract long AbstractNode.size()

      Retrieves the sub node if exists.
      N AbstractNode.subGroup(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves a group sub node that not necessarily exists.
      N AbstractNode.subLeaf(java.lang.String name)
      Retrieves a leaf sub node that not necessarily exists.

      Truncates information.
